## Checklist

- [ ] I have validated the change locally or in CI.

### Config surface (only if adding a new user-configurable setting)

- [ ] Justification: user intent vs tuning is documented.
- [ ] Ownership is clear (module owner listed).
- [ ] Single-plane design (config OR CLI OR env, not multiple).
- [ ] Tests added/updated (unit + integration as needed).
- [ ] Budget impact acknowledged and offset (remove another knob if over budget).
